body.name: 2 Pack Wireless Lavalier Microphone for Camera/GoPro/iPhone/Android Phone/Laptop/Computer, Plug-Play 2.4GHz Wireless Microphones for Video Recording, Interview, Vlogging
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Automatic Connection & Easy to Use】 Our wireless lapel microphone has a plug-and-play design that makes it easy to get started. Simply connect the receiver to your device via a Lightning cable/Type-C cable/3.5mm port/USB adapter and the wireless microphones will connect automatically. No driver installation or app download is required, making it an incredibly user-friendly option.

【Dual Noise Cancelling & Superior Audio Quality】 Featuring a built-in noise reduction chip and 2.4G signal transmission, our camera microphone delivers crystal clear sound in real-time with minimal background noise. The furry windscreen also helps to improve audio quality in outdoor environments, ensuring an immersive listening experience for your viewers.

【Compatible with All Devices】 Our lavalier mic is perfect for Camera/GoPro/iPhone/iPad/Android phone/Tablet/Desktop PC/Laptop/MacBook/iMac/Voice Amplifier/Speaker, making it suit for a range of applications, including Interview, Meeting, podcast, vlogging, Live streaming, YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, etc. You can use the same microphone for all of your needs.

【65Ft Audio Range】 With a large capacity rechargeable battery and low-power chip, our camera mic offers more than 6 hours on a single charge. The wireless range extends up to 65 feet, allowing you to record high-fidelity audio indoors and outdoors from a distance.

【Portable & Convenient Storage】 Our mini mic comes with a storage case and extra clip, making it easy to carry and clip onto your shirt or hold by hand. The dual bluetooth lapel microphone lets you use two microphones simultaneously or independently. The wireless mic for cameras or other devices is ideal for on-the-go streaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound quality. Works well for recording for Yoto MYO card
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the mic is decent for the price.The connection between the mic and receiver is automatic once both are switched on, easy to use. Works well both on Android Samsung Flip 4 and Macbook Air. Just remember that for Mac OS, you will need to change input of the sound under "settings" to USBAudio 1.0The quality of the sound is good for a quiet background, will still hear some background noise if it is too noisy. Nonetheless, the mic works well for its intent, I do recording of stories for my little one on my phone as I do MYO cards to play on her Yoto player.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome mic! No adapter needed on the GoPro Media Mod, though.
reviews.reviewText: These mics sound great. I tested them out quite a bit to see how they function. Here's what I've learned while using them with my GoPro Hero 10 with the Media Mod installed.Cons:1. The audio plug causes the dongle for these mics to stick out of the back of the mic and it feels like it might break off one day.Pros:1. I tried using the picture on the listing to see how to attach it to my GoPro, and it says to use the included adapter. I did that and the audio doesn't work. (Just static.) That's a great thing because you don't have to use the adapter, which means the risk of breaking it off the expensive media mod is lessened.2. I placed one mic in one room, and the other mic in the other room, then I whispered into the GoPro Media Mod mic, and nothing came through. (That's expected. So, any table noise or whatnot from where the camera is placed, won't be an issue.) I whispered into each mic separately, and each mic worked just fine. (You could keep one mic shut off and just use a single mic as well, but both mics do work at the same time.)3. To use these mics, all you need to do is turn them on and plug it into your device. No wifi/bluetooth/special keypresses. Just turn them on, plug it in, and they work.Overall, I'm impressed with this mic setup, and I'll be using it for my YouTube channel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound Quality!!
reviews.reviewText: Wireless Transmission works great and is very reliable even at a distance. picks up every word clear and crisp. Easy to connect to different devices, as simple as plug and play. Great value for a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lags and background noise ruins your vocals
reviews.reviewText: Any background noise, wind, or engine noise causes the noise reduction to kick in, distorting your vocals. Bad. It also has a lag, so if you're trying to sing along with a song, forget it. In a quiet area, it does a great job. It pairs fast and has a good, clean sound.

reviews.reviewText: These work very well with my vlogging camera

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Sólo falta que pongan algo para proteger la entrada de sonido TRS minijack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for school newscast
reviews.reviewText: My students have different types of phones and it works perfectly for all. We also fil in hallways that echo heavily and these mics seem to filter most of it out! I'll buy more next year.
